http://aria.saiin.net/%7Esagiri/UK-LE/00.html
(the rest of the fanart deals with another historic figure connected
to Aizu and the Fujita family in the Meiji--Yamakawa Hiroshi)

look for Hijikata's name
(don't know his name yet? Please see
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/ShinsengumiNames.htm)

then click on #1 to see Saitou fanart!

root http://www.aizukanko.com/~shinsengumi (there is something wrong
with the index---taking a really long time to load)

[what] kind of art appeals to fans of manga?
The art above shows the range found in "Shinsengumism"===but those
same artists who created the works above are also fans of anime/manga.

So can you do SEc a BIG favor pretty please?
and visit this site and give your honest opinion
http://www.dragonsdisciple.com/ click on ::NEWS:: and cast your vote
{warning} there is a yaoi theme to this novel so stay away if you
can't stand that sort of thing
